gaia::content::CalendarEvents Class Reference

Constants and helpers for the Calendar Events, Instances and Attendees table. More...

#include <CalendarEvents.h>

Detailed Description

Constants and helpers for the Calendar Events, Instances and Attendees table.

The following example demonstrates how to use the CalendarEvents

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {
     // new Context instance
     Context* context = new Context(this);

     // new CalendarEvents
     CalendarEvents events(*context);

     //add value
     ContentValues cv;
     cv.addValue(CalendarEvents::Events::ALL_DAY(), 1);
     events.add(CalendarEvents::CALENDAR_EVENTS_URI(), cv);

     //set value
     ContentValues cv2;
     cv2.addValue(CalendarEvents::Events::TITLE(), "Meeting");
     events.set(CalendarEvents::CALENDAR_EVENTS_URI(), cv2, "_ID=0", NULL);

     //get value
     Cursor* results = events.getN(CalendarEvents::CALENDAR_INSTANCES_URI(),
         NULL,
         CalendarEvents::Instances::_ID() + "=1",
         NULL,
         NULL);

     if (results != NULL && results->moveToFirst()) {
         do {
             // ...do something
         } while (results->moveToNext());
     }

     //remove value
     events.remove(CalendarEvents::CALENDAR_EVENTS_URI(), "_ID=0", NULL);

     delete results;
     delete context;
 }
